name: Bruschetta
description: Bruschetta is an Italian appetizer consisting of grilled or toasted bread, often rubbed with garlic and drizzled with olive oil. It's frequently topped with a variety of ingredients, most commonly fresh tomatoes, basil, and balsamic vinegar.

name: Greek salad
description: A Greek salad, also known as 'Horiatiki' or 'village salad', is a refreshing and flavorful salad from Greek cuisine. It typically consists of a mix of fresh, juicy tomatoes, crisp cucumbers, tangy red onion, salty olives (often Kalamata), and a generous amount of feta cheese.

name: Moussaka
description: A great Greek moussaka - the layered gratin of eggplant, potato, lamb-tomato sauce and cheesy bechamel - is about as delicious as Mediterranean-inflected comfort food gets.

name: Grilled fish
description: Grilled fish is simply fish that has been cooked on a grill. This typically involves exposing the fish to direct heat, often over an open flame or a hot surface. The fish is not coated with batter or breadcrumbs, and it's often seasoned with simple ingredients like salt, pepper, and lemon.

name: Tiramisu
description: Tiramisu is an elegant and rich layered Italian dessert made with delicate ladyfinger cookies, espresso or instant espresso, mascarpone cheese, eggs, sugar, Marsala wine, rum and cocoa powder.

name: Lemon dessert
description: A lemon dessert is any sweet treat that features lemon as a primary flavor component. This can include a wide variety of recipes, from classic lemon pie and cheesecake to refreshing sorbets and unique variations like lemon posset.

name: Caffe Latte
description: A cafe latte, often shortened to latte, is a coffee drink made with espresso and steamed milk.

name: Lemonade
description: A refreshing summer drink made from lemons, sugar, and water.
